```{r, echo=FALSE}

if (!requireNamespace('knitr', quietly=TRUE)) install.packages('knitr')
library(knitr)
options(width=100)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.path='figures/', fig.align='center',
                      ## dev=c('pdf', 'png'),
                      warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, prompt=FALSE,
                      echo=FALSE, comment=NA)

```
